bibl.note: Polish-Egyptian Archaeological Mission at Tell-Atrib, 1989-1994. - 5 bread stamps with floral-geometric decoration and 6 other with figural decoration. Limestone or terracotta, from the 3rd cent. B.C. to the Roman period.
